data.title: A Functions Existential Crisis

content: Welcome to recursion, where functions call themselves like lost souls trying to find meaning. We’ll cover what recursion is, how it works, and how to keep your brain from crashing like your code.

content:

Simplifying your wardrobe saves time, money, and reduces decision fatigue while ensuring you always feel confident in what you wear.

data.description: A hilariously painful journey through floating point math in JavaScript. Yes, 0.1 + 0.2 ≠ 0.3.
data.title: JavaScript Math is a Lie

content: Ever tried `0.1 + 0.2 === 0.3` in JS? Yeah, it returns false. In this satirical-yet-informative piece, we dig into why JavaScript math feels like it’s gaslighting us and how to work around it without losing your mind.

Effective time management is key to balancing your personal and professional life, reducing stress, and achieving your goals.

data.description: An absurdly fun breakdown of promises, async/await, and why your code never waits when you want it to.
data.title: Promises in JavaScript: Trust Issues in Code

content: Promises in JavaScript are like the friend who says they’ll help you move and shows up three hours late. In this article, we unpack promises, async/await, and how to stop chaining `.then()` like it’s a bad habit.

data.description: Why JavaScript's `this` keyword breaks brains and hearts—explained with relatable memes.
data.title: Why Does this Hate Me? Demystifying JavaScripts this

content: Ah yes, the infamous `this` keyword in JavaScript—responsible for more broken code and debugging tears than any other. In this article, we’ll laugh through the pain and explain what `this` actually means in different contexts.
